title: Next ban wave is going to be hillarious
body:
have seen 5 first pick doublelift skill kalistas on my silver smurfs in provisionals today, no one is confused as to what you're doing LOL, I have mained Kalista for about a year, and I know how often she is played adequately in silver, it's almost never.

inb4 they're here on the forums complaining about getting banned for using "Wooxy" or "WUT I DIDN'T GET ELO BOOSTED"
